## Project Type: Python Streamlit Dashboard
**Description:** Interactive dashboard for Bali et al. 2012 trace element partitioning model with:
- Fixed pressure (26,100 bar)
- Selectable salinities with checkboxes
- Mantle compositions (DM, PM)
- Mixing model visualization
- Fixed axis ranges for Mo/Ce vs U/Th plots
- White grid lines and enhanced visualization
